Title: Pixel Perfect
Writer: Alan Sacks (story), Neal Shusterman (story), Neal Shusterman (teleplay)
Actors: Raviv Ullman, Leah Pipes, Spencer Redford, Chad 'Chato' Alger
Plot: Samantha's band, the Zettabytes, is meeting with little success, so her friend Roscoe uses his knowledge of technology designed by his father to create a holographic lead singer, Loretta Modern. The band instantly becomes successful, but Samantha begins to feel alienated, Roscoe discovers feelings for Samantha, and Loretta struggles with individuality.
